original_title: El chico de los días azules que no puede salir
overview: An anonymous testimony recounts the harsh experiences that are lived in Mexican society being part of a community that, to date, is rejected, marginalized and violated for proclaiming and demanding their rights, which have been denied by religious and falsely moral ideologies that continue to permeate within families and the country.
title: El chico de los días azules que no puede salir
